description_html:
Sina Pearson is proud to introduce the Island Collection, three striking upholstery patterns. The Island
Collection follows the Nordic Collection as being inspired from a journey to and around Iceland. While the
Nordic Collection celebrated traditional Nordic textiles and colors, the Island Collection was inspired by
Iceland’s vast and stunning landscapes and vistas. From the renowned and astonishing Aurora Borealis seen in
its winter skies, to the variegated tones in the mountains and meadows, to the smallest scale mosses growing
on stones in lava fields, Iceland offers an array of rich and muted colors created by nature itself. With global
inspiration, these textiles are designed for contemporary interiors that demand style and performance.
